page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PHILIP
page.content: 7.57.am I get up,wash and dress.I wear jeans and a T-shirt. 8.15.am Time for breakfast,cereal and toast with fruit juice to drink.I go up to the shed and fetch my B.M.X. bicycle. 9.37.am I arrive at my friends.We play games and catch frogs in his swimming pool.Then we ride our bicycles doing all sorts of tricks. 1.00.pm I have my dinner of grilled sausages and jacket potato followed by fruit juice. 1.45.pm I ride to the woods with my friend where we have an obstacle course for B.M.X. 4.00.pm Tired and weary we return home and lock away the bikes.We start to paint my moulded lead figures,then watch television. 6.15.pm I have tea (sandwiches and cake)then it's T.V.8.30.pm Bed time.
